title: The moment Bachelorette star Ciarran Stott 'snorts white powder' off a man's bare buttocks
text:
Ciarran Stott, who is one of the favourites to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette, has been filmed in a compromising position.

Shocking footage has surfaced of the former Army rifleman appearing to 'snort white powder' off another man's bare buttocks.

In a video, first published by New Idea, the 25-year-old appears to inhale the substance of his friend's bottom while in a kitchen.

Scroll down for video

REVEALED: The moment Bachelorette favourite Ciarran Stott 'snorts white powder' off a man's bare buttocks in a leaked video... after his 'gay performing' past was revealed

In the clip, the reality TV star stands over the unidentified man as he lies face down on a bench with his backside on display.

The male was seen wearing a short tartan skirt and white cropped T-shirt.

For the video, the skirt was pulled down to expose his bare bottom as Ciarran lent down to sniff a substance on one of his cheeks.

What's going on here? In the clip, the reality TV star stands over the unidentified man as he lies face down on a bench with his backside on display

Fun night in? In excitement, Ciarran raises his arms up in celebration before rubbing his nose with one hand

The Englishman soon goes back for a second snort as a group of men are heard cheering him on in the background.

In excitement, Ciarran raises his arms up in celebration before rubbing his nose with one hand.

Wearing a bright orange T-shirt, Ciarran appeared to be dressed more casually than the man lying in front of him on the kitchen bench.

While his hair is his current shade of blonde in the leaked footage, it's unclear when the video was taken.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Ciarran Stott and Channel 10 for comment.

Unclear: While his hair is his current shade of blonde in the leaked footage, it's unclear when the video was taken

The Manchester-born reality star is no stranger to the spotlight, as it was revealed earlier this week he used to be a nightclub performer.

In 2016, he would regularly perform on stage in skimpy underwear alongside drag queens at Darwin's leading gay nightclub, Throb.

Ciarran even starred in a midnight Christmas show in December 2016 titled 'Camp Christmas: Freezn', which was inspired by the Disney movie Frozen.

'He's not gay but has always been the centre of attention and loved being up on the stage,' a friend of Ciarran's told Daily Mail Australia on Thursday.

Another insider said he 'only worked at Throb for a few months' but has performed as a dancer at other venues across the Northern Territory.

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: Ciarran Stott, who is one of the favourites to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette, has been filmed in a compromising position.
